description: Update the properties of an Event Trigger.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: EventTriggerName
parameters.description: The unique name of the event trigger.

parameters.name: EventTriggerConditions
parameters.description: A list of conditions that determine when an event should trigger the destination. (dict) --- Specifies the circumstances under which the event should trigger the destination. A list of dimensions to be evaluated for the event. (dict) --- A specific event dimension to be assessed. A list of object attributes to be evaluated. (dict) --- The criteria that a specific object attribute must meet to trigger the destination. Source (string) --- An attribute contained within a source object. FieldName (string) --- A field defined within an object type. The operator used to compare an attribute against a list of values. A list of attribute values used for comparison. (string) --- The operator used to combine multiple dimensions.

nested_params.name: EventTriggerDimensions
nested_params.description: A list of dimensions to be evaluated for the event.

nested_params.name: ObjectAttributes
nested_params.description: A list of object attributes to be evaluated.

nested_params.name: Source
nested_params.description: An attribute contained within a source object.

nested_params.name: FieldName
nested_params.description: A field defined within an object type.

nested_params.name: ComparisonOperator
nested_params.description: The operator used to compare an attribute against a list of values.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: A list of attribute values used for comparison.

nested_params.name: LogicalOperator
nested_params.description: The operator used to combine multiple dimensions.

parameters.name: EventTriggerLimits
parameters.description: Defines limits controlling whether an event triggers the destination, based on ingestion latency and the number of invocations per profile over specific time periods. EventExpiration (integer) --- In milliseconds. Specifies that an event will only trigger the destination if it is processed within a certain latency period. Periods (list) --- A list of time periods during which the limits apply. (dict) --- Defines a limit and the time period during which it is enforced. The unit of time. The amount of time of the specified unit. MaxInvocationsPerProfile (integer) --- The maximum allowed number of destination invocations per profile. Unlimited (boolean) --- If set to true, there is no limit on the number of destination invocations per profile. The default is false.

nested_params.name: EventExpiration
nested_params.description: In milliseconds. Specifies that an event will only trigger the destination if it is processed within a certain latency period.

nested_params.name: Periods
nested_params.description: A list of time periods during which the limits apply.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The amount of time of the specified unit.

nested_params.name: MaxInvocationsPerProfile
nested_params.description: The maximum allowed number of destination invocations per profile.

nested_params.name: Unlimited
nested_params.description: If set to true, there is no limit on the number of destination invocations per profile. The default is false.

nested_items.description: The destination is triggered only for profiles that meet the criteria of a segment definition.
